issue.title: change user_amounts to json
issue.body: This should be better, change to `init.db` to make `user_amounts` `jsonb` instead of `varchar`.

issue.title: Get the bitcoin conversion rate and display sats owed to user
issue.body: Added table to `init.sql`: `rate`, which stores the current bitcoin rate in case the API to get bitcoin price is down (or if the user in on an airplane all day tomorrow 😉).

issue.title: WIP: Create bill.
issue.body:
I can make a curl request to create a bill on server and it works. Client doesn't. I run into issues with the password authentication.

I can no longer register or log in.

Can you try this PR out and let me know how it goes? Also, you need to create a new column on table `bills` called `user_amounts`. See `init.sql`.

I can make a curl request to create a bill on server and it works. Client doesn't. I run into issues with the password authentication.

Can you try this PR out and let me know how it goes? Also, you need to create a new column on table `bills` called `user_amounts`. See `init.sql`.

issue.title: Viewing bills
issue.body:
Added a bills list and (publically viewable) bill page so that we could use it for showing a bill and maybe allow unauth users to pay their portion of the bill via lightning without needing to be logged in? We could use this bill page to do some logic around paying the bill too maybe. 

May need to update some of the pages based on what comes out of the bill creation logic, but I can update that as needed. For now, just wanted to get some simple pages up there.

issue.title: Create bill form and persist to DB
Updating database configs/commands
issue.body:
Requires deleting the previous docker container, running `docker-compose up db` again, and copying over the `.env.example` values over to your own `.env` file. New default username/password/database for this project so hopefully doesn't clash with anything else, if that was happening at all. 

also removed the foreign key constraint, a little unnecessary for now.
